name: Deltora Quest: The (Unofficial) RPG
description:
Deltora Quest: The Unofficial RPG, developed for a game design class.
Based on the book series "Deltora Quest" by Emily Rodda.

Developed by:

Bruno "Schico" Schieck Terziani https://schico.itch.io/

João Victor "JV" Menezes Ferreira https://itch.io/profile/jvmenezes

Thiago Eugênio Martins de Castro https://itch.io/profile/thiagoemc
